feat.name: Deneith Battle Stance
entries: Thanks to your training, you are more difficult to push around on the battlefield. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves to resist forced movement.

feat.name: Blood of the Dauntless
entries: You can shake off effects that would incapacitate you on the battlefield. When you would gain the Stunned condition you reduce its value by 1 (to a minimum of 1). When you have the Confused condition you may spend your actions to do nothing, cast the Shield spell, or Raise a Shield on your turn.
